wordGroup: mainframe computer 大型计算机；主机电脑

sentences.en: The network has a gateway into the hospital mainframe.
sentences.cn: 该网络有一个网关连接医院主机。

sentences.en: Most have slavishly copied the design of IBM's big mainframe machines.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数公司都一味模仿IBM大型主机的设计。

sentences.en: I downloaded the whole thing into the hospital mainframe before I left work today.
sentences.cn: 我今天下班前把全部内容下载到了医院的主机上。
